import React from 'react'; import CheckoutSteps from '../components/CheckoutSteps'; import { useSelector } from 'react-redux'; import {Link} from 'react-router-dom'; export default function PlaceOrderScreen(props) { const cart = useSelector((state) => state.cart); if (!cart.paymentMethod) { props.history.push('/payment'); } const toPrice = (num) => Number(num.toFixed(2)); //5.12345 => "5.12" => 5.12 cart.itemsPrice = toPrice(cart.cartItems.reduce((a, c) => a + c.qty * c.price, 0)); return (

  • Shipping

    Name: {cart.shippingAddress.fullName}
    Address: {cart.shippingAddress.address}, {cart.shippingAddress.city}, {cart.shippingAddress.postalCode}, {cart.shippingAddress.country}

  • Payment

    Method: {cart.paymentMethod}

  • Order Items

      {cart.cartItems.map((item) => (
    • {item.name}
      {item.qty} x ${item.price} = ${item.qty * item.price}
      • ))}
) }
